textual_report:
BioDrCx

The undirected graph BioDrCx has 3289 nodes and 84940 edges.

RAM requirements

The RAM requirements for the nodes and edges data structures are 396.23KB and 180.30KB respectively.

Degree centrality

The minimum node degree is 1, the maximum node degree is 497, the mode degree is 1, the mean degree is 51.65 and the node degree median is 27.

The nodes with highest degree centrality are: 486 (degree 497 and weighted degree 497), 58 (degree 397 and weighted degree 397), 419 (degree 381 and weighted degree 381), 421 (degree 355 and weighted degree 355) and 632 (degree 343 and weighted degree 343).

Weights

The minimum edge weight is 0.55801964, the maximum edge weight is 4.249 and the total edge weight is 245813.06228888035.

Weighted degree centrality

The minimum node degree is 0.56, the maximum node degree is 695.97, the mean degree is 74.74 and the node degree median is 35.71332937479019.

The nodes with highest degree centrality are: 720 (degree 302 and weighted degree 302), 759 (degree 270 and weighted degree 270), 486 (degree 497 and weighted degree 497), 103 (degree 265 and weighted degree 265) and 608 (degree 276 and weighted degree 276).

RAM requirements

The RAM requirements for the edge weights data structure is 679.54KB.
